text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to state that goods from Great Britain to Northern Ireland bound for the EU are considered the \"red lane\". The candidate answer explicitly states: \"Goods going to (or at risk of going to) the EU (i.e., across the NI\u2013Ireland border): move under a full EU customs/SPS regime (the **Red Lane**).\" This directly addresses the requirement, as goods from GB to NI that are destined for the EU must use the Red Lane.", "criterion_id": "1fbc9e0c-27a7-41d8-8b68-11d82cb38b2f"}
